subject: [perl #42899] [PATCH] t/codingstd/tabs.t improve diagnostic output
body:
On Mon May 07 04:40:24 2007, codermattie wrote:
> Hello,
> 
> My version of Emacs appears to be leaking tabs into files despite
> having this in my emacs config:
> 
> (setq indent-tabs-mode nil)
> 
> To help track down the problem in emacs/cperl and get it fixed I need
> better diagnostics. I have
> attached a patch that adds the line numbers to each instance of a tab
> being detected in the
> whitespace of a file. Also all the violating lines, not just the first
> are listed.
> 
> This should be a win all around.
> 
> Cheers,
> Mike Mattie - codermattie  at gmail.com

Thanks!  Applied in r18449.
